name: Lunar Impact
description:
Mission Report S117: Captain, you have been chosen to embark on a mission of utmost importance. We have intel that a meteor the size of the Statue of Liberty is hurling its way to Earth. You're mission, if you choose to accept it, navigate your way through our asteroid belt, drop the M.O.A.B. on the meteor and get out of there before it explodes.  Our lives are in your hands, captain. 

End Transmission......

Launch into the depths of space and test your skills as a rocket pilot in our immersive Lunar Impact puzzle game. With 2.5D gameplay, you'll have to strategize and master the controls to make a safe landing on the various lunar surfaces and become a true space hero.

This project has been a fantastic experience, and I want to thank the two other developers on the project with me. Their Itch and LinkedIn will be below if you want to check them out as well as keep up with any future projects we embark on.

Dawson
